title: KDWAVE Women's and Men's Fleece Lined Pom Beanie Winter Warm Classic Jacquard Knitted Beanie with Cute Pom Pom Ski Cap
features: UPGRADED THERMAL FLEECE LINING - During the endless cold days, your warmth has always been our top concern. Thus we add thick and skin-friendly fleece lining to our pom beanie, allowing you to spend an extra warm and cozy winter

HIGH QUALITY POM BEANIE - Our pom beanies are nicely finished with super soft and anti-pilling material, protecting sensitive skin from cold; The inner seam is concealed, super cozy to wear; The adorable fur ball is firmly sewn to the top; Machine washable and never fade or deform

DESIGNED IN LONDON UK - Cute pom, Novelty PU Label, classic Nordic jacquard style; designed by our awesome design team in London UK, our cuffed pom beanies make you look stylish and pair off with your outfit. You deserve one!

ONE SIZE FITS MOST - Our pom pom beanie is made with super flexible materials to adapt to various head shapes and sizes even you wear eyeglasses, headphones. It stretches to fit both men's and women's head snugly and won't slip off

SUITABLE FOR WIDE OCCASIONS AND GREAT GIFT - Our beanie with pom designed not only for keeping head and ears warm in casual occasions but also in enjoying your favorite outdoor activities, like hiking, walking, running. Great gifts on Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year, Valentine's Day, etc.
description: KDWAVE is an on-trend lifestyle brand, specializing in providing quality products with excellent design from our professional UK design team. The word Wave, drawing inspiration from both the ocean and sound waves.The KD Wave range is built on the latest trends across fashion, art and music, to create a unique, innovative and high quality brand.
